text: the other incredible nominees this year for their unbelievable performances.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: The Revenant was a product of the tireless efforts of an unbelievable cast and crew I got to work alongside.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: First off, to my brother in this endeavor, Mr. Tom Hardy.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Tom.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Your fierce talent on screen can only be surpassed by your friendship off screen to Mr. Alejandro Iñárritu.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: As the history of cinema unfolds, you have forged your way into history these past two years.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: What an unbelievable talent you are.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Thank you to you and Chivo.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: for creating a transcendent cinematic experience for all of us.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Thank you to everybody at Fox and New Regency, in particular, Arnon Milchan.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: You were the champion of this endeavor.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: My entire team.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: I have to thank everyone from the very onset of my career.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Mr. Katen Jones for casting me in my first film.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Mr. Scorsese for teaching me so much about the cinematic art form.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: To Mr. Rick Yorne,
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Thank you for helping me navigate my way through this industry.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: And to my parents, none of this would be possible without you.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: And to my friends, I love you dearly.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: You know who you are.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: And lastly, I just want to say this.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Making The Revenant was about man's relationship to the natural world, a world that we collectively felt in 2015 as the hottest year in recorded history.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Our production needed to move to the southern tip of this planet just to be able to find snow.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Climate change is real.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: It is happening right now.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: It is the most urgent threat facing our entire species, and we need to work collectively together and stop procrastinating.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: We need to support leaders around the world who do not speak for the big polluters or the big corporations, but who speak for all of humanity, for the indigenous people of the world, for the billions and billions of underprivileged people who will be most affected by this.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: for our children's children, and for those people out there whose voices have been drowned out by the politics of greed, I thank you all for this amazing award tonight.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Let us not take this planet for granted.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: I do not take tonight for granted.
speaker: SPEAKER_00
